perturbation.original_text:
HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's 
agent. CSE, as follows 

$10,000
Within ten (10) days of the parties execution of this Agreement 
$15,000
Within 60 days of the parties execution of this agreement 
$25,000*
Ten (10) days prior to the Production Session 

[*Should Company decide not to conduct the Production Session, then the $25,000 allocated for said 
Production Session ("Production Fee") will not be owed to Celebrity and notice should be given to 
CSE as soon as reasonably known by Company if Company does not intend to conduct the 
Production Session. However, if Company schedules the Production Session, then said Production 
Fee is non-refundable regardless if the Production Session occurs. ]

(a) CSE, shall invoice HDS for these fees and HDS shall pay such invoice within ten (10) business days 
following receipt of the CSE invoice.
perturbation.changed_text:
HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's 
agent. CSE, as follows 

$10,000
Within ten (10) days of the parties execution of this Agreement 
$15,000
Within 60 days of the parties execution of this agreement 
$25,000*
Ten (10) days prior to the Production Session 

[*Should Company decide not to conduct the Production Session, then the $25,000 allocated for said 
Production Session ("Production Fee") will not be owed to Celebrity and notice should be given to 
CSE as soon as reasonably known by Company if Company does not intend to conduct the 
Production Session. However, if Company schedules the Production Session, then said Production 
Fee is non-refundable regardless if the Production Session occurs. ]

(a) CSE, shall invoice HDS for these fees and HDS shall pay such invoice within thirty (30) business days 
following receipt of the CSE invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the payment deadline for invoices. The original text states that HDS shall pay invoices within ten (10) business days following receipt, while the modified text extends this deadline to thirty (30) business days. This creates uncertainty as to which payment term is to be enforced, potentially leading to disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text:
B. Celebrity shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to HDS in 
the event of the occurrence of any of the following: (1) HDS adjudicates as insolvent or declares 
bankruptcy; or (2) HDS fails to provide consideration due pursuant to this Agreement, within ten (10) days 
following the date such consideration is due hereunder, provided that HDS is notified in writing of such 
non-payment by Celebrity and such payment by HDS is not made within three (3) days following such 
notification; or (3) HDS fails breaches any covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if 
curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Furthermore, HDS agrees that such termination 
shall not relieve it of its obligation to provide consideration as contemplated hereunder. Celebrity shall not 
have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this paragraph.
perturbation.changed_text:
B. Celebrity shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to HDS in 
the event of the occurrence of any of the following: (1) HDS adjudicates as insolvent or declares 
bankruptcy; or (2) HDS fails to provide consideration due pursuant to this Agreement, within ten (10) days 
following the date such consideration is due hereunder, provided that HDS is notified in writing of such 
non-payment by Celebrity and such payment by HDS is not made within three (3) days following such 
notification; or (3) HDS fails breaches any covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if 
curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Furthermore, HDS agrees that such termination 
shall not relieve it of its obligation to provide consideration as contemplated hereunder. Celebrity shall not 
have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this paragraph.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the amount of days Celebrity must provide written notice prior to termination. The original text states that Celebrity must provide ten (10) days prior written notice, while the modified text increases this time period to thirty (30) days. This creates uncertainty as to which notice term is to be enforced, potentially leading to disputes over improper termination.

perturbation.original_text:
HDS will provide Celebrity’s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance 
within five (5) days of its request for same.
perturbation.changed_text:
HDS will provide Celebrity’s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance 
within thirty (30) days of its request for same.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the amount of days in which HDS must provide Celebrity's Agent with a certificate of insurance. The original text states that HDS will provide Celebrity’s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance within five (5) days of its request for same, while the modified text states thirty (30) days. This creates uncertainty as to which timeline is to be enforced.
